title: Diving Experience!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Last time, you showed me how to make a flower arrangement. Today, I’m going to teach you how to go diving!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Diving...... I’ve never done anything where I’ve had to wear this much equipment before. This is making me anxious.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, that’s right. Don’t worry, though. There’s no need to be scared of the sea.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>O-okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Let’s see...... looks like you put on the wetsuit correctly. Good job. Now, put on the fins and the mask. Then, put this on your back and put on the regulator......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Can you really breathe with this? I want to practice a bit more on the boat......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Don’t worry. I’ll be there to escort you through the sea. Don’t sweat it. Here, put it on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Mhmm. Mm! Mm!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You’re ready? Alright. Hold my hand, and we’ll dive together. One, two, let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Mmm! ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
